title: CPU Scheduler
text: a simple simulation for some CPU scheduling algorithms.

title: Server Monitoring API
text: a simple API built with Flask and containerized with Docker. The image monitors the host server that it runs on.

title: DFT Calculator
text: a simple program to calculate and plot the Discrete Fourier Transform and its Inverse, Fast Fourier Transform is implemented also.

title: Perceptron Training
text: single layer neural network training algorithm implemented with MIPS assembly language.
